TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeObjectCreateExpression extends System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

Docs.summary: Represents an expression that creates a new instance of a type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CodeObjectCreateExpression can be used to represent an expression that creates an instance of a type.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression.CreateType%2A> property specifies the data type to create a new instance of. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression.Parameters%2A> property specifies the parameters to pass to the constructor of the type to create a new instance of.
## Examples The following example demonstrates use of CodeObjectCreateExpression to create a new instance of the System.DateTime class using the default constructor.
[!code-vb[CodeMultiExample#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.codedom.codeobj_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[CodeMultiExample#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.codedom.codeobj_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[CodeMultiExample#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.codedom.codeobj_1.cs)]
